Sentencas: There is growing interest in developing oxide materials for direct hydrocarbon solid oxide fuel cell anodes.
Titulo: Influence of lattice oxygen stoichiometry on the mechanism of methane oxidation in SOFC anodes

Sentencas: In addition to electronic and ionic conductivities, the electrocatalytic activity of these materials is a critical requirement for a high performance anode.
Titulo: Influence of lattice oxygen stoichiometry on the mechanism of methane oxidation in SOFC anodes

Sentencas: In this paper, we present evidence for the important role of variable lattice oxygen stoichiometry and anode geometry in dictating the activity and reaction mechanism of La(0.75)Sr(0.25)Cr(1-x)Mn(x)O(3-delta)-based anodes for CH(4) oxidation.
Titulo: Influence of lattice oxygen stoichiometry on the mechanism of methane oxidation in SOFC anodes

Sentencas: Total oxidation of CH(4) is favored by low oxygen vacancy concentration and availability of reducible B-site cations.
Titulo: Influence of lattice oxygen stoichiometry on the mechanism of methane oxidation in SOFC anodes

Sentencas: The non-linear dependence of electrode polarization resistance with current density is attributed to dynamic changes in lattice oxygen vacancy concentration.
Titulo: Influence of lattice oxygen stoichiometry on the mechanism of methane oxidation in SOFC anodes

Sentencas: The relatively high open circuit potential of porous anodes compared with thin films is attributed to an increase in secondary reactions of the fuel within the porous anode.
